title: Synergistic effects of
abstract: Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) is a major precursor to colorectal cancer (CRC). Our previous study demonstrated that combined administration of the probiotics  This study highlights the therapeutic potential of SupCBAKK, a novel postbiotic formulation derived from the combined fermentation metabolites of CB and AKK, IBD, and colitis-associated colorectal cancer through the modulation of gut microbiota and immunometabolism.
